subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The Gotham Stakes runner-up, Yawanna Twist, is among six horses whose owners paid a $6,000 fee to add them to the list of Triple Crown contenders.
snippet: The Gotham Stakes runner-up, Yawanna Twist, is among six horses whose owners paid a $6,000 fee to add them to the list of Triple Crown contenders.
